info.description:
This story is pretty simple and I might as well put the first part in this description.

You are a guy (or girl for certain paths) who has no really luck getting yourself a girlfriend. However you come across a magic shop that nobody else seems to notice. You meet the owner and suggest a few things. They seem to expensive to you. However, the owner makes a deal to give you at least one spell you could use and you decide to have one to make your own girlfriend.

The owner gives you the spell on a sheet of paper for a pretty reasonable price since it would have been quite expensive affording a spell book. The spell itself is actually simple to use. The only catch is that you need a target for the spell or else it might not work or something could go wrong.

From there you take it home and decide what to use the spell on.

This spell is VERY powerful. It can change a human to a potential girlfriend and can even turn a guy to a girl. It can also me used on plants, animals, inanimate objects, cells/materials and even pictures.

There is another catch. There is not guarantee the target will want to be your girlfriend. They still have free will. However, the longer you spend time with the girl and her to get to know you, the chance she might become your girlfriend.

Pretty simple concept. Have Fun!
